Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.UiElement

          • org.mini2Dx.ui.element.TextButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actionable, FlexUiElement, Hoverable

    public class TextButton
extends Button
    Utility implementation of Button that contains a Label
